summary: Cyberpunk 2077 - В игре будет система последствий, детали
title: Cyberpunk 2077 - В игре будет система последствий, детали
body: Благодаря интервью Майка Пондсмита, создателя оригинальной настольной RPG Cyberpunk 2020, мы узнали кое-что о системе решений и последствий в ARPG Cyberpunk 2077 от студии CDProjectRED. И нас ждет не традиционная система кармы. Любое действие может п… Читать дальше »

tags: pheew i managed to not get too long
but i have a lot of details
summary: had some new ideas for Vana’s story thus some redesigns absolutely sponsored by lesbian brain to summarize she was badly injured...
caption:
had some new ideas for Vana’s story thus some redesigns absolutely sponsored by lesbian brain

to summarize she was badly injured while protecting a life of a corp who became fascinated with her and offered to pay for her treatment IF she agrees to be his muse and “a canvas”

so here she is a Cyberware showcase model with a lot of deadly machinery (that she doesn’t have access to) put into her and a lot of aesthetic biosculpting done to compliment the product

life of luxury and fame? yes! but lets say frequent appearance changing and installing of new parts make a great base for cyberpsychosis..

summary: Where are the Radical Politics of Cyberpunk ? (waypoint.vice.com)
title: Where are the Radical Politics of Cyberpunk ? (waypoint.vice.com)
body:
The aesthetics and politics of the genre shadow a harsh reality: there might not have been all that much “punk” there to begin with.

summary: The Witcher - stigao je stoni RPG
title: The Witcher - stigao je stoni RPG
body:
The Witcher – stigao je stoni RPG

Nakon više od tri godine od kada je prvi put najavljen, klasični stoni RPG smešten i svet čuvenog vešca Geralta će nam konačno stići ovog leta.

Igra nosi jednostavni zvanični naziv – The Witcher Role-Playing Game, i tematski je smeštena u period između prve i druge igre u serijalu. Na igri je radio R. Talsorian Games, pa će i igra koristiti njihov modifikovani sistem Fuzion, ali se za sada zna…

View On WordPress

tags: The Last of Us Part II
summary: Game Critics Awards - Die Gewinner der E3 2018 stehen fest
title: Game Critics Awards - Die Gewinner der E3 2018 stehen fest
body:
Game Critics Awards – Die Gewinner der E3 2018 stehen fest

Die E3 2018 war mal wieder DAS große Gaming-Event, welches vom 12. bis 14. Juni stattgefunden hat. Neben ersten Gameplay-Material zu The Last of Us Part II gab es außerdem noch einem Story-Trailer zu Cyberpunk 2077. Natürlich auch große Erwartungen wie Fallout 76 und Anthem.

Am Ende der E3 2018 gab es die Game Critics Awards, welche von 54 Pressevertretern in 17 Kategorien abgestimmt wurden.

(mo…

View On WordPress
